short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will add a LinkedIn button next to sender's name on Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The button is a handy one, especially if you are receiving emails from different professionals. The button will appear next to the name of the email send in Gmail and it will immediately send you to their LinkedIn Search.
